text:
Message 596 of 4024
Please stop these emails.
I have requested you stop on many instances.
They are unwanted and are harassing in nature.
They are very scary and frightening and progressively become more aggressive in tone.
Sent:01/21/2024 at 10:49 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/21/2024 at 10:49 AM)
Subject:Re: Zero Progress
Message 597 of 4024
So... we agree we are both escalating. If I read correctly, you started it, telling me I’m an abuser and began the 25 years of terror discussion, not me.
Your mo even when we in good times is that you say crazy stuff, are incredibly mean, and expect me not to reply.
I will find that to be challenging. Reflecting on the Golden Rule, you do unto others as you would have done to yourself. So don’t do it to me, and I’ll
be better about not doing what you just did to me back. Does that sound like a good plan? I can do it.
I’ll also struggle if you continue to lie about your lies.
It’s too much. You stood with me on a dirt path at Tumblecreek swearing to me, that what I am able to send to you never happened. It did. I have
pictures to prove it did. And you still deny it. Did HR see those?
Your dishonesty and deceit is undeniable. Yet you stand on a platform of an utterly false reality you created and preach, ruin my entire life, take my
queen, kids, home, money, and livelihood. All while you proactively destroy my reputation with friends.
Perhaps in your haste to ask me to reflect, as they say “physician, heal thyself”. Take a moment to examine your deeds. We should be strolling the
farmers market, holding hands, buying shrooms and pasta and dreaming the dreams of an honest married couple.
Your insistence on a false reality to justify your demonstrably narrcisitc and Moyer family destructive behavior and abuse is scary and frightening to
me. Please stop
Sent:01/21/2024 at 11:06 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/21/2024 at 12:37 PM)
Subject:Re: Zero Progress
Message 598 of 4024
You are totally dark.  You refuse to cooperate or coordinate any of the big areas we need to make progress on. I won’t repeat that list of hi-pri areas.
You are as aware as I am.
We have had the entire weekend. Two days you had no work. The only real com we have had was f2f at ADs game when you told me that you were
not going to do what we agreed to.
Sent:01/21/2024 at 01:00 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/21/2024 at 01:58 PM)
Subject:Zero Progress II
